review:
I cannot say enough wonderful things about
Dr Mason his bed side manner is the best he makes you feel comfortable his knowledge is second to none. I was pregnant with my 5th child at 40 years old I was turned away by 3 OB's and was told by 1 that if I was his wife he would advise to abort.
Dr Mason sat with my husband and I and said all is good see you in a month. You cannot put a price on having trust and confidence in your Doctor. I delivered by c-section a heathy baby boy and the c-section was with out any complications. Dr Mason you are Respected and truly loved by my family.

Love Dr. Mason! The man walks on water for me! Hateed to leave him when I decided not to have any more children. Confess that I went there formy yrly obgyn exam and pap cause I liked him so much. He is the BEST! The most knowledgebale caring and compassionate physician. I always recommend Dr. Mason to anyone having difficulties during pregnancy.

He Is the worlds most amazing high risk dr In my eyes!I was on a long road of miscarriages and dr's that didnt seem to help,I had met Dr. Mason once before when I was sent to him for a one time visit from my original obgyn for him to check my blood clot disorder and he prescribed me lovenox.The first time I met him he put me at ease and I wanted to go back to him but my dr said I'm not high risk so my Insurance wouldnt cover him.Finally after 3 losses I was high risk and he became my dr when I found out I was 12 weeks along In yet my 4th pregnancy.I Instantly felt safe In his care,something I never felt before.My baby was born early due to me developing preeclampsia and is currently in the nicu,but he is here!He wasnt another loss!Dr mason checks on him twice a week In the nicu which puts my mind at ease.I dont feel so alone.I look forward to getting pregnant In a couple of years knowing that I will be under Dr. Masons care!He Is my hero.

He is one of the best doctors I have ever seen (and I know a lot of doctors). He treated my friend with absolute compassion and answered all questions. Even though our genetic problem was complicated, he broke it down to understandable portions and helped us through every step. His staff was great and the students he works with are top notch. He sets a new standard in the Ob/Gyn world

Dr.Mason is the best doctor I have ever seen! He has unbelievable bedside manner,sensitivity,patience, and knowledge! He was my doctor for all 3 of my children. I would recomend him to anyone! I wish he could be my doctor for regular visits. I truley miss him and appreciate everything he did for my family and I! Not only is he an amazing doctor he is also a friend!

I am a physician in Family Practice and trained under him for OB/Gyn experience and he was also my OB Dr for both my kids. I have seen him with other patients and myself and would never choose anyone over him. He is such a good and caring person and I have to agree, treats you like family. Not only does he have a good bed-side manner, he has more experience and knowledge than most physicians and is able to maintain calm through any stressful situation. He saved me from having a premature baby at 23 wks...and I was able to make it to 35 wks...only because of him. I have never met an OB Dr like him and don't think ever will unfortunately, since I have now moved to California.
Treats you better than family. Very personally and caring. Had had this doc for over 20 years even followed him from one hospital to another.
He is a very patient and knowledgable doctor. What he recommends is according to recent publications. I am very pleased with the care I have recieved from him.

Dr. Blumer is very attentive and patient. Physician. He answer all of your concerns. He also assesses home life and work which is very important when treating. I was a little disappointed that for 6 years I have always received a call back from him with test result info. I did not receive a call back from him the last two times. The only thing that has changed is my insurance however, I hope this is not the reason
The best doctor. I would recommend him to every woman...I wish I had known him years ago. He pesonally calls back.....and cares about the whole person physically and mentally.
Great Doctor! He has been my gynecologist for at least 10 years and he is always pleasant, honest, and considerate.

I find Dr. Blumer looking in the internet for reviews because I had moved just few months to Southfield, MI and I was looking for a good doctors in my area. He was the best doctor that I found in many years. He spend time with their patients and explain everything that you have to know.
He always takes time and makes sure you have asked all your questions before he leaves the room.
The best docter I have had. A very nice man, very professional, honest, knows his subject, very helpful and kind. I went to him as long as I lived in Detroit.

He is the best Doctor I have ever had. He ALWAYS takes time to answer questions, and he is humble enough to admit when he doesn't know the answer to something (which is rare). I have complete confidence in him.

Dr. Blumer is professional, respectful and objective, but also warm and friendly. He'll patiently and thoroughly answer your questions, no matter how many you have, or what your appointment was originally for. He NEVER makes you feel rushed. Oh, and if he doesn't know the answer to a question, he'll say so! Imagine that! I've been with him for almost 10 years.
Very nice, very professional, and always calls back promptly. Spends a good amount of time and explains everything clearly.

From my first appointment with Dr. Lichten over two decades ago, I found the physician who has had the most impact on my physical well being that spilled over onto improving my emotional and sexual health, as well. He's extremely bright and works to make a positive difference in the lives of his patients. As an anti-aging physician, he is the absolute best!
I wish I had more to say about Dr. Edward Lichten, but we never really got to know each other as Doctor - Patient.
Dr. Lichten was my doctor in my teens & continues to treat me now that I'm in my 40's! I consider him my primary care! I'm afraid of the day he retires! I would highly recommend him to anyone!

I have been going to Dr. Lichten since 2008. He is the most dedicated compassionate physician that I have ever known. I am proud to say that he is my doctor, and a very good one. His level of knowledge and commitment to practice, place him well above other MD's in his area of practice. Because of his treatments, I have an active, pain free life, despite my 2008 Arthritis and Lupus diagnosis.

Dr. Lichten has worked with me for over 15 years,through the changes in a female body. He has helped to changed my life into a fulfilling, happy, young , vibrant, partner . Thank You Dr. Lichten. Carol B.

Dr. Lichten is superb. Combine brilliant with compassionate, articulate with common-sense approaches and you begin to get an idea of what this doctor can do to help others live longer and happier lives. He's simply the bet.

I have been going to Dr Lichten for over 15 years. No one guesses that I am 50 because I started on my anti aging kick early. I trust Dr. Lichten and feel that my health is better and I look better than 90% of women my age due to the treatments and recommendations of Dr Lichten. He is very brilliant and goes off his gut instinct and works with you and your own personal issues. I feel some of the comments above are likely due to the newer nature of natural hormones and also Dr.Lichten suffered the loss of his wife in the past 2 years. I highly recommend him to all my friends.

My husband and I went to see Dr. Lichten to treat both our hormonal deficiencies. He was incredibly insightful and with so much knowledge to share. My husband, a physician himself never got such an education in hormones and in such a short time. Everything Dr. Lichten said made a lot of sense to both of us. We loved him.

He saved my life-neck rupsured-had two ivs a week and pain would go away every time for 5 hours at a time.He WAS A GOD SEND FOR ME. REFERRED FROM A FRIEND WHOSE FATHER WAS A DOCTOR IN ROCHESTER, MICHIGAN. I WOULD DEFINATELY REFER PEOPLE TO HIM AND HOPE TO IN THE NEAR FUTURE.
Very little patient follow up is provided. Professional courtesies are lacking as well as clear record keeping. Not sure that he is a caring physician.

Other than being a bit run down I had an excellent experience in the Detroit office. No issues. All went fine. Dr Kalo & staff were professional. No complications after. Happy I chose the clinic & Dr Kalo.

n response to the negative comment left by the potential hire: Upon arriving to the office at 8:57am I was approached in the parking lot by a woman asking if my name is Pam. I replied yes and asked if she had an appointment. The woman then aggressively states she had an interview at 8:30am and she had been waiting for over 45mins. I simply stated she must have made a mistake as our location doesn't open until 9am (This information is also located on the front of our door). She then loudly yells she is never wrong and even our web site indicates we open at 8:30. My reply was simply that she clearly made a simply mistake; as for our web site there is a disclaimer that our times and fees are subject to change sometimes without notice. I ask her name and she replies I'M a doctor! I DON'T make mistakes. It was at this point I stated was no longer interested in conducting an interview as base on her aggressive behavior not to mention I was not even in the building yet. I simply wished her the best in endeavors to find a medical position elsewhere. This person then shouted BYE!. I then opened the front door to the building and to my surprise she was behind me still yelling. I asked her several times to leave the office only to have her question my position, my authority and insisted she be interviewed. Again, I refused to conduct this interview and stated it was for a Medical Assistant not for a physician. She then stated she would be reporting me for being unprofessional. She stormed out of the office spouting profanities. Once my internet was running I checked her resume which indicates she has a LIMITED medical license & she is currently unemployed. There are no references listed on her resume nor any disclaimer indicating they would be furnished upon request. The actual time of her interview was at 2:30pm on 12/18 as stated in my notations dated 12/12/2018. This facility prides itself on hiring compassionate, caring and understanding staff. Our patients are our main concern and we would never jeopardize our integrity or standards by considering someone that does not meet these qualifications.

This individual claimed that she was an MD but wants to work as a medical assistant. Apparently she called multiple facilities and she got confused between them. We don’t open our facilities until 9 am and definitely not given the appointment to see the administrator at 8:30. Those circumstances and the fact that she was very aggressive and inconsistent just indicates that she is not telling the truth and got confused with multiple appointments that she made at different clinics. We are a private doctors office licensed by the state of michigan and have 5 stars on google. Its inadequate for us to hire a MD to work as a medical assistant especially. Dr Kalo talked to the specific individual and talked to Pam and concluded the truth and the true aggressive behavior of the above individual.
Women's Center, The staff , the Nurses, the Dr. all wonderfully caring people.

I don't normally write reviews, but this is more of a Thank You note to all the nurses, Medical assistants, Dr. Kalo and especially to Pam the lady that talk to me. The Western Women's Center really cares about every single person that comes in. They are friendly, funny and when I needed to just talk- She/they listened. The people outside far away from the door haven't a clue what they are talking about! Shame on them for trying to use scare tactics. Don't believe them! Thank again, Pam and staff. "you" really helped me through the most difficult time in my life to date and for this I am/will always be eternally grateful.
Can't say enough great things about Women's Center. The staff , the Nurses, the Dr. all wonderfully caring people. I am definitely going to recommend this clinic to all my friends and family.
From the phone call to vist they were extremely helpful,kind,understanding& so much more! This was my first time and I’m glad I chose this clinic they are the best!! I highly recommend this clinic.

My young daughter became pregnant. I do believe I callee every clinic on the intwrent. I choose Women's Center because the lady answering the phone was extremly compassionate. Once in the office the counselor really spent quality time with my daughter. After a long talk we decided the heavy sedation was the way to go. It did cost a little more but was very much worth it to make sure my daughter was less nervous and comfortable during her visit. The medical staff was friendly and took the time to make sure we understood everything. The nurse in the recovery room brought me back aftee the surgery, she was knowldegable and very sympathetic to our situation. We then once again discussed birth conteol options that would fit my daughters needa. This clinic sincerely cares abouy its patients. I could noy be anymore pleased with our desicion to chooae Womens Center and Dr. Kalo, i would highly recommend this office.

I'm an older woman & needed to get an abortion. I researched all the abortion clinics in the area and I'm so glad I came to this clinic. The staff was so nice and professional. The receptionist really took the time to listen to me and never once made me feel ashamed or embarrassed. The Dr. was very informative and made sure I fully understood what was going to happen before, during and after the procedure. I paid extra for the twilight sedation and it was worth every penny! I hardly felt a thing and was sooo relaxed. I want to recovery and the Registered Nurse took very good care of me & was very friendly ( She even gave me a choice of cookies and juice!) My husband came with me and he said the dr came out and talked to him. The Dr. made sure my husband understood what care I needed when I got home. I don't normally write reviews but when the office called to check on me a few days later to see how I was and again, took the time to really talk to me I felt it was my duty to inform all the women (young ladies) that might be going through the same thing to go to the Woman's centers you will be treated with respect and dignity. RECOMMEND THIS CLINIC 110%.

My daughter and I have been patients of Dr Kalos practice for years. We always have been very satisfied with the professional and cordial treatment from the staff. We know this practice takes care of 100s of patients..we inquired about these "bad reviews" and according to the Medical Director those patients had demanding and aggressive behaviors. Which makes sense considering I've seen a few in his office with my own two eyes. Our doctor is BOARD CERTIFIED, not to mention staff there are very knowledgeable and answer ALL of your questions, not just some. Did I mention he's licensed by the state? Do your research people, you would be surprised how many doctors arent. These bad reviews are insane and I give nothing but a 5 star in my eyes.
Been seeing him for years. Awesome, caring doctor. Always goes out of his way.

Dr. Wu and staff were very friendly and made me feel comfortable. I was seen right on time and was called immediately when my test results were in. Dr. Wu gave advice and NOT orders on what I could do to improve my health. I was also given options and I was allowed to choose what option best fit me not the doctor. I walked out of there feeling like family.
Wonderful dr. I drive over an hour even though I moved out pf the area.
I love Dr. Wu! He is so kind and caring! I could not have asked for a better Dr!
I love Dr. Wu! So thoughtful and caring! I really appreciate how he will call me with my lab results.
Dr. Wu has been great! He will see you the day you call If you have any kind of possible issue. Takes time to look for the problem and very thorough. Couldn't have asked for a better doctor
Make you feel very comfortable. He's very smart and he makes you feel that you are his only patient. I wish all doctors were like him.
Dr. Wagstaff was very friendly and took the time to explain everything. He is also very good looking!
Dr. Wagstaff is extremely kind, patient, knowledgeable and research-based.
Dr. Wagstaff is the kindest Dr. I have ever met, he gets on the patients level and has a calm and relaxed approach and only does what is needed.

Dr. Wagstaff is a caring and very knowledgable doctor. He is patient and kind and seems very hard working. He also has children and this helps him understand his pregnant patients better. I would recommend him to any pregnant woman who is looking for a decent doctor.

Dr. Cairgle is a the best OB/Gyn in the Detroit Metro area. His bed side manner and interpersonal skills are superior. He takes time to explain medical terms and procedures and to educate his patients. He has a way of making all of his patients feel like they are his only patient. He is also very knowledgeable and professional. I would highly recommend him to any patient looking for a compassionate and competent doctor.

I have recommended family members and friends to Dr. Cairgle. He has been my OB/GYN for the past 15 years he delivered my 12 year old son, and I wish I new him with my other 3 children. He is very thorough, gentle and understanding. Eventhough he is male, I feel that I can confide or discuss my medical concerns with him without being looked down upon. My family and friends ask me "where did you find him"? They appreciate him as well. (A. Jones)
Dr. Carigle has been my doctor for over 12 years. He is an excellent doctor. I would reccommend him to any one looking for a great doctor. He takes a lot of time with his patients.
Dr. Cairgle is absolutly awesome. He is very patient, kind and gentle in his approach to caring for you. My husband loves he will deliver all of our children.

Dr Cairgle is a great doctor. One of the best I have ever had. If your looking for someone to make you comfortable, take time with you and answer all of you questions and more he is the doctor for you. I think I can speak for his patients when I say he makes everyone of them feel like there his only patient. I base all of my doctors on his standard of care. Yes, at times we have to wait for him, but believe me HE IS WELL WORTH IT because when he comes in the room it's all about you and he does not rush you at all. He should teach others how to care for patients. My mother who was very hard to impress gave Dr. Cairgle 5 stars plus.
Great doctor with Amazon skills. So fortunate to have found him. Saved my life
Excellent surgeon, caring, compassionate, spends time answering all your questions. His administrative and medical staff are top notch. I highly recommend Dr. Hanna and his team!
Great doctor him and his staff were truly amazing and made me feel comfortable. And save my life
The most amazing doctor! He truly saved my life! So blessed to have found him!
Very compassionate and competent doctor! A rare combination- she actually listened to me!

Very skilled and knowledgeable doctor. I recommend her highly, especially for treatment for fibroid uterus. I refer all my friends to her since she gave me such a good result from my surgery for fibroids.
Spent time to listen to me in a compassionate and respectful manner despite have a really busy practice.
Intelligent, personable, straight shooter!! I highly recommend him !!

I really enjoyed the staff here at Dr. Steveson office but him not so much. His bedside manner was very rude. His jokes were inappropriate! One example of one of his bad jokes was during my breast exam him asking me to lean forward and shimmy 🤔 thank God my boyfriend was not there he would of been pissed! I've been having a rough pregnancy and I've told him this and he has no compassion at all! Just all jokes. One day I went in with so much pain and all I hear as I'm laying down is him out in the area with the nurses talking so loudly and so obnoxiously I wanted to scream! At one point I started to just leave! His personality is just too over the top for me. He never seemed to be genuinely concerned for my pain. My mother didn't like him. Nor did my father or boyfriend
I would not recommended him to my friend's and family that's for sure.

I reviewed Dr. Stevenson in May 2016 for recommending a d&c on a viable pregnancy. So glad a second opinion was sought. I am now a happy grandma to a healthy baby girl. Always trust your gut instincts and seek another opinion if something does not seem right.

I would not recommend Dr. Stevenson to anyone. First of all, he was the doctor on-call, so no relationship had been built prior to labor and delivery. There was no immediate congratulations after my daughter had the baby. He told my daughter to stop talking and just push, and that she talks too much. Wow! she was telling me (her mother), that his assistant nail was hurting her while she was trying to deliver the baby. My daughter and the baby's father talk about it afterwards. We didn't say anything at the moment because we didn't want anything to go wrong with the delivery. You can't go around mistreating people and think its okay. Second of all, doctors should always introduce the on-call doctors ahead of time so moms to be can feel more at ease. Don't take that choice away from them and think that any doctor will do.

Terrible doctor. He wanted to schedule my son's girlfriend for a D&C because he said that he didn't THINK the baby was growing. She opted to see another doctor for a second opinion and heard a healthy heartbeat. To want to schedule a D&C without another ultrasound or any other testing is absurd. Would not recommend him to anyone.
Awesome - For the first time in life I don't dread going to obgyn. Dr. Stevenson I the BEST

HORRRIBLE STAFF. I didn't even get to meet the doctor because the staff wouldn't allow me to even after my 3rd prenatal visit. I've never met so many rude people in one atmosphere. I had no idea that it was even possible to have this many rude individuals coexist together. I will never recommend this office to anyone I don't even know how they're in business.

I have been a patient of Dr. Stevenson for over 10 years. I have never had a bad experience. The wait time has never been an issue except if he has to leave for a delivery which is undee understandable. The other staff in this office are wonderful,kind and caring professionals. I have always received prompt return calls and I have no complaints. Dr.Stevenson really tries to put the patient at ease and explain things thoroughly. He has never let me leave without making sure any and all my questions are answered. I would definitely recommend this Dr. and the P.A., Jessica. There have been numerous times where I actually was surprised by how much time they spent with me, so I have never felt rushed or unimportant as a patient.

I went here for the first few months of my pregnancy. My waiting room wait was often an hour to an hour and a half(and i'm not exaggerating). They did run a few tests that I didn't need and they didn't follow the things I told them that needed to be done per my insurance. So I got charged for everything because all the useless tests were sent to the wrong facilities. I'm sure he knows what he is doing, but his bedside manner is rude. When he first introduced himself to my husband and I(then fiance)...I said hi i am ..... and this is my fiance ..... His response was, let me see the ring. No ring, means no engagement...It was just all downhill from there. :(

Excellent doctor! Have trusted him and his staff for over 20 years. They have gone out of their way to answer any questions I have and are not afraid to debate/discuss alternative treatment options. They listen to you and are honest and open. They delivered both my children and I can truly say that I had THE BEST deliveries because of how knowledgeable, caring, and cooperative they are. They are the anchor in my health care and work with me in maintaining a healthy life. I would be lost without them. Highly recommend this office.

This doctor caused a complete pelvic organ prolapse causing me to have a colon resection as well as having to have my small intestines tacked up on my tail bone. He comes off as up on medical care and speaks the lo groups of women about pelvic organ prolapse and repair. He needs to. He does not get repeat patients so much because of his incompetence

NEVER SEE THIS DOCTOR what a complete nightmare, I visited their office on Nov 23 and since then their blatant incompetence and complete indifference to patient care has forced me to communicate with their office so much it has become a second job. I have called them 22 times in the past 60 days regarding a refill. STILL NO PRESCRIPTION. These people are useless. NEVER go here.

Dr. Makela is one of the few Drs qualified in this robotic procedure in the area. I felt very comfortable with his expertise. He took his time answering my questions and I felt very lucky to have so my surgery
Dr. Makela is an excellent Dr. He spends quality time with me, answers all of my questions and is an excellent surgeon.
I have been with Dr. Makela he delivered my last baby over 14 years ago. I love his mannerism and he is very thorough. He answers all your questions and you don't feel rushed. Wonderful Doctor..

Dr. Makela's expertise as a urologist/gynecologist has been of great benefit to me. The surgery he performed for my prolapsed bladder problems was successful and my quality of life has improved since the surgery. During office visits, he takes time to answer all my questions, and I never feel rushed. I'm thankful for Dr. Makela , his competence, and his professional, caring manner.

THIS IS THEE BEST DOCTOR!!! I AM PERSONALLY NOT BIG ON PAPS...HE IS AN ANGEL! VERY GENTLE AND VERY HUMANE! I HAD 3 VERY HARD PREGNANCIES. I WAS SEEN AT LEAST 3 TIMES A WEEK THROUGHOUT MY ENTIRE PREGNANCIES. CHOOSING HIM AS MY DOCTOR WAS ONE OF THE BEST DECISIONS I EVER MADE!
Love, love, love Dr Bolnick! I always feel safe and secure with my pregnancy after seeing him.
Dr. Bolnick was not my primary OB physician but he followed me while I was in the hospital for approximately 100 days. He was great! I would highly recommend him.

We couldn't be happier with the care we have received from Dr Bolnick. If and when we decide to have another high risk pregnancy we would choose him again. My husband and I feel we received the best care possible!
Dr. Bolnick was very condescending to my husband and I . Very unprofessional .
Left her office in tears due to her dismissive attitude toward my very serious high risk pregnancy. She told me I was no longer high risk- second options proved her wrong.

Dr. Shyla R. Vengalil had always made me feel safe,comfortable and relaxing in her care. I have had a very difficult time with all my pregnancies. She was a gift from God for my husband and I.Dr. Vengalil made it possible for us to have 2 beautiful daughters. Without her care my daughters would not be here today. I too lost twin boys in a still birth due to a birth defect. I know Dr. Vengalil did all she/man kind could do to save them(Gabriel and William)God gave my husband and I our boys and took them quickly to join him in heaven. After such a tragedy that I remember every day of my life, God gave us another miracle my baby girl who would not be here without Dr. Vengalil's expertise! My baby was 3 weeks early but the scary part of this story is if Dr. Vengalil would have waited to deliver our little girl she would have suffercated due to the true knots in the umbilical cord. My husband and I named our baby girl Shyla. Thank you God for putting Dr. Shyla Vengalil in our lives!!!

Dr. Vengalil was extremely knowledgeable and made me feel at ease throughout my pregnancy. Although she was not on call the night I went into labor, she still came in just to deliver my baby. I couldn't ask for more in an OB.

Dr. Vengalil is the best doctor I have ever had. She is friendly and very knowledgeable. This was my first pregnancy and I was diagnosed with ICP. It was quite severe. I almost had to deliver my baby at 28 weeks. With her prescribed treatments I recieved, I was able to wait until 34 weeks until my body gave out and I had to deliver. She was so calm and relaxed throughout this whole process. It made me feel very calm and relaxed myself. She took me as a patient during the last 6 weeks I was pregnant and I felt way more comfortable with her as my doctor then I did with my long time OBGYN. If my husband and I decide to have another child in the future I will definately have her be my doctor since I will more than likley have the same complications. I would recommend her to everyone who has a high risk pregnancy. She is a wonderful doctor!!!

I'd went to her for my previous pregnancy, but i'd a stillbirth@7mnths. I felt she wasnt knowledgable, being a specialist in "high risk pregnancies". She still cant come up with what went wrong!! I'd rather go to a Dr.. who's more knowledgeable.

This doctor and his office was so mean to me. They set me an apt within a whole month when I was bleeding and when I called twice to ask for a sooner apt. , I was told that the doc. Does not want to see me, and cancelled my apt.
I LOVE Dr. Khalifa. I've been with him for 12 years now . He has delivered all of my babies. He is the most caring doctor and takes time to attend to your needs. His staff is also very friendly.

Dr.Khalifa has been very knowledgeable and willing to take the time to answer all of my questions without rushing. All too often, medicaid patients are treated with less concern and respect but I feel that I have received the same care as would a miillionaire. He comforted me before a recent surgical procedure and took the time to speak with my husband afterwards. Although always professional, he is also personable and friendly. I highly recommend him, and his staff is fabulous, efficient and friendly also.
Great doctor. Very personable and interested in your concerns.

This dr. is amazing he has performed surgery on me, I barely have any scarring. He is very professional, and very GORGEOUS!! I would recommend him to anyone. He has answers to all of your questions, and is very helpful. He has a great professional sense of humor. He can make you laugh during a pap without being unprofessional. I love him!
I trust Dr. Bolinjkar for my care. She follows up after the visit and makes sure I am doing ok. Very caring and responsive at the same time
Very sharp and intelligent. Communicates very well. Overall provides good care and I can trust her for my care
Dr. Billis delivered both my children and she is absolutely wonderful. I think I only waited past my appointment time a few times, she is just great.
I am an OB nurse that works with Dr.Billis and i would definitly go to her when am expecting. I have seen her at 5pm and 3am and her personality and skills never change.

Dr. Andrei was very knowledgable and answered questions I had, but I felt rushed by her demeanor. She's a busy Dr., I get that, but I almost felt like I shouldn't ask anything else so she could move on.
She is a fantastic Dr..helpful..caring and very skilled

Dr. Maxwell provides excellent, personalized attention and care. If there are any concerns that I may have she takes the time to sit and address my concerns so I leave fully understanding any issue I may have had prior to my visit
Dr. Maxwell is one of the best I've been too - she's patient and knowledgable. She also took the time to actually read my history and fully prepared for me as a new patient.
Very good doctor. Very knowledgeable. Direct. Positive demeanor.
I think she is a wonderful doctor. Very friendly and the appointments are fast unless you have questions.. She's always willing to listen, and answer questions. She's very direct and to the point.
She is a passionate doctor and knowledgeable in each visit

Great appointment, doctor Gomma, was super clear, took her time to answer all my questions and gave me a lot of tips to improve. She is very gentle and warm. I didn't have to wait a lot of time in the wait room.
I have always been able to talk to the doctor and get my problems resolved. Coming here is like dealing with trusted family. Would not consider changing doctors.

Great doctor!
I cannot say enough positive things about this practice. From the office staff to the doctors and nurses- everyone was always extremely kind and efficient. They made the pregnancy and delivery of my wife.
extremely positive experience and I am so very thankful to everyone!!!

This doctor was very rude and not gentle at all. I think I cried almost every visit because it was so painful. Once she left the office I was going to, I got a new doctor that was very delicate and kind. Do not settle for her unwelcoming behavior!

He has been my Dr for over 20yrs, delivered my 3 kids and I have nothing but praise for him and his staff. He personally called me after a routine exam because of an abnormal result, got me in that same day and I had surgery 2 days later. I trust him with my life.
Dr Drenchko diagonosied my condition correctly while others had not and I suffered for 3 years and $$$ . I am very grateful.
very rude and not patient friendly :(. This Dr. is the worst Dr. I have ever seen.
Understanding, and helpfull. Explains things so that you can understand.
Very personable and easy to talk to.

Do not go to him under any circumstances. My experience with him was AWFUL. I was referred to him by my primary dr for an abnormal pap smear. During the colposcopy he didn't explain what he was doing, why he was doing it or what to expect. I ended up having a conization (a type of laser surgery) and he still didn't tell me anything. He only gave me short, quick answers to my questions. Just how much does he really know?!
friendly, helpful and knowledgeable staff. I would reccomend my family to this office.Thanks

Dr. Hendrix was caring and right on point. From just talking to me she was able to figure out my diagnosis. I needed surgery and she eased all my fears about it. I would send all my female family members and friends to her.

The secretary can be very rude at times. The medical assistants are very nice and caring. Dr. Vista provided me with overall fair care. At times, I felt like she didn’t listen to my concerns when I told her I was in pain.

After reading some of these comments, I think they must be talking about someone other than the Dr. Vista I see because my daughter and I have NEVER had a negative experience with her!
Granted, her staff isn't always the most professional, but Dr. Vista has been nothing but kind, caring and empathetic. I've had some bad experiences with a few female gynecologists and a very creepy inappropriate encounter with a male one. Dr. Vista made me feel safe, to the point of doing the bare minimum of invasive procedures or examinations until I felt comfortable. Even my anxiety riddled daughter trusts Dr. Vista so much now she goes to her appointments alone.
After every examination you meet her back in her office where she asks about your life, answers your questions and addresses your concerns. I genuinely feel like she cares about me. She sees me once a year, yet she remembers details that I told her the year before.
I will NEVER see another doctor besides her ever again.
Rude! Made me feel rushed & was very impersonal. No thanks!! You're over rated as an OB!
I went to see her in 2015, I could not agree more with some of the reviews she is very stand off. I never went back

Dr. Vista Deck is an excellent doctor she delivered my two little girls and i have been seeing her since i was 16. I will never have another baby with any other dr but her. She is amazing, and i would definitely recommend her to anyone. She is caring, considerate, and is amazing at her job.

I would not recommend Dr. Visa to anyone who is pregnant. You'll get minimal attention or not attention from her at all. She doesn't share any information and she keeps it very short. She won't even ask you if you have questions or not. I did not feel any connection with her.
My prenatal visits were less than 2 minutes - she came to the room, measured my belly and heard the heartbeat. She walks away without asking me if I were to have any questions or not in the end.
P.S. Even though I read these reviews but I kept myself optimistic. Now I regret it for ignoring these negative comments.
DO YOU REALLY WANT AN OB/GYN LIKE HER FOR ALL OF YOUR PRENATAL VISITS FOR NEXT 9 MONTHS? (THINK TWICE) Her front desk people were unprofessional, gossiping in the office and laziness.

Very unprofessional, staff is not very friendly. When ask questions answers were always changing. No information given about symptoms etc. Ultrasound cancelled 3x by doctor/office. would not recommend!!

She was amazing. We had our Mikey 3 years ago. He was born over 9 pounds. He was delivered with no tearing, and she bragged about it, and she should have. We always had great appointments pre-birth. I'd never have a child without her at the end of the bed. She is an excellent obgyn. I can't imagine a better experience. She cared. That mattered most.
She doesn't share enough information and time with the patient. Very short and unsatisfactory answers. If you do not ask you won't know, she doesn't even warn you about things to be careful for.
Very thorough and , knowledgeable!! Would highly recommend her.
Excellent doc! Very compassionate and caring. Takes time to listen.
Very worst hospital staff, Doctor is rude and shows her busy frustration schedule on patients. treatment is ok. Dont go to her.
Excellent doctor. Explains everthing in detail and in layman terms.
Very thorough and compassionate. Would recommend her highly.

This doctor was one hour late for my appointment and I arrived 15 minutes early, her staff is rude and un-knowledgeable. When she did see me she told me she could not perform the scheduled test. Wasted a total of 2 hours of my morning.
She is the best obgyn I went to. Thank you so much. She answered my questions . And was very help. She is nice , kind and knowledgeable. She made me feel comfortable

Dr. Mims was NOT my first choice for an OB. I saw her 30 minutes before my surgery, and just did not feel as if I could trust her. She had a rather abrasive bedside manner, and did not clearly answer my questions. She refused to see me before I was discharged, and it was like pulling teeth to get her to call me back when I had some questions about my surgery. Her office finally got in touch with me--she never spoke to me, she had a nurse read me a message she'd left--and when I told her office that I would not be seeing her again in the future, I was basically hung up on. Based on my limited interactions with her, I'd not recommend her.
Worst Ever

Dr. Mimms is a very knowledgeable and down to earth doctor. She explained things in a way I could understand what was going on. I was happy also that she did extra tests to make sure I wouldn't have another problem I had previously, while assuring me that it would be normal to have that fear. thats what got me thru it was repeating what she said- it will be ok. My only problem stemmed from something she couldn't help and may not have known about- which was communication from the on call nurses. This is beyond her control though. I also was grateful she stayed after hours, thru a severe storm, researching a question I had and called me immediately with an answer. I was so impressed she was working at 7pm. I had to change to a different hospital for insurance reasons, so regretfully, I only had her as my OB for the 1st trimester but I recommend her to anyone and am SORRY we didn't get to see the pregnancy thru

Absolute WORST experience I've ever had. She and her nurse are terrible! They are rude and mean, she yelled at me in front of her other patient bc I didn't know what room to go in and said I need to quit bothering her nurse. She had the nerve to call me a high maintince patient after she saw that she made me cry. I have 3 ulcers on my esophagus from throwing up 7 times a day in my 1st trimester to which their response was "it's apart of pregnancy" my new ob was appalled and quickly gave me zofran. 2 yrs later the ulcers are still here and caused me to get pneumonia according to my MD.
She is THE best ob I've ever experienced. She's very down to earth. Bedside manner is impeccable. She makes each patient feel as if you are her only one. I would recommend her to everyone.

Dr. Morris and his staff are absolutely amazing. It is very true when the hospital says it has a "passion for healing". They truly stand by thier mission statement. They genuinely cared for me in my situation and made me feel completely comfortable considering the awkwardness of exams and very personal info exchanged. I was referred to him for a 2nd opinion by my ob/gyn. I truly appreciated his bedside manner and the fact that he never was in a rush to go to his next patient. I didn't mind the waiting because I knew he was going to be giving me his undivided attention as well. I am forever grateful to him for the outcome I received by him. He gave me hope when I thought their wasn't any. He is easy to talk to about anything which only helps put the patient at ease. I HIGHLY recommend Dr. Morris and his staff if you are looking for compassion, knowledge, professionalism, quality and personality during your process of getting back to health.

Dr. Morris is board certified in gynecologic oncology and limits his practice to the management of cancers of the female reproduction system. Dr. Morris was recognized as a "Top Doc" in obstentrics and gynecology by Hour Detroit magazine in 2008. Dr. Morris is very helpful and knowledgeable, takes his time to answer my questions and has a great bedside manner.

this was the WORST experience i've ever had with an obgyn (i am 40). this was my first visit to this office and dr ocampo did not even introduce herself to me upon entering the room. she sat down with her back to me and grunted a few questions at me. i am quite certain she didn't hear my responses, because she barely acknowledged me. i did not feel human during the exam. she just abruptly poked and prodded me. she stuck the device in my vagina and i told her i thought it was too large. her only response was, "no it's not." then without warning she stuck her finger in my anus!!! talk about a violation and complete shock!!! after that horrifying episode i was ushered into her office where i had to wait another 20-30 minutes before she came in and wrote out scripts for tests (mammogram/blood) without even ever looking at me. when she was finished, she did not ask whether i had any questions. she just got up and left and said follow me to the check out. HORRIBLE! the staff was nice tho.
I've never been in pain during my yearly pap exam until I started going to Dr. Ocampo. Last year I was in tears on the table. I'm online now trying to find a new doctor.

I have been going to her for years, excellent doctor.Her staff is excellent also. Every surgery I have had her and her staff helped out in every way. She spends quality time with her patients. The only time you really had to wait if she was delivering a baby,and/or really busy with patients. I would recommend 100%

Have been seeing her annually for 12 years. Spends plenty of time answering my many questions and explaining additional options I may have. Is considerate of my expenses when prescribing drugs (osteoporosis) and/or tests (bone density and mammos).
Great Staff - Dr.Lall takes the time to listen and talk to his patient.

Absolutely the best! Seemed very experienced and approchable. Nice office staff, very professional. He had a doctor in training with him, A fact that i liked. Tells me he has lots to teach the specailists of the future.

Poor staff communication to patients. Dr. Deppe also has uneffective communication skills. Waited two hours with little or no results. Vaction was the topic of the day along with off color remarks and boasting and bragging. Horrible experience.

Excellent doctor. He took time to answer every single one of my questions in an easy manner. Still asked me if there was anything else I need it to know. He kept a positive attitude the entire visit, never seemed rushed. Wish all my doctors were like that.

I went to him as I had uterine cancer. His first words to me were you know why you have cancer. I said why. His respone because you are fat. I should have walked out of his office then. I was from March to Sept. healing. Was sent home from the hospital with my incision leaking. That I think was the nurses fault. She should have called the dr. but didn't. That was the hospital fault. After being home a couple of days my white count was very high and back in the hospital I went.
Dr Lee needs to lose well hybrid and become more energetic, so that she can focus on her work. Sorry, she is not setting s good example
Most horrible, arrogant and lazy doctor. Big bully- does not listen

Very knowledgable on OB-GYN issues and is really concern with overall patient care.
I would recommend her to family and friends.

Laziest doctor'I ever had in my life. All she does is sit in her office on her computer. She will haveyou waiting in that cold room for 30-45. Just to come in & do nothing for 10 minutes. Waste of a visit right? You tell her problems you are having & she totally ignores it or says it's normal because she is too d*mn lazy to check it out. Will be changing doctors ASAP!

I really was not impressed with Dr. Lee. I think that, at heart, she's a nice person, but she's really concerned about liability and orders tests based on that. Fear-based medicine, I'd call it. I did like her better than her partner, Dr. Mims. I don't think that I'd go back to Dr. Lee. She answered my questions, but never really reassured me. She tried to rush me into having surgery that I needed, but she acted as if I didn't have it that day, I'd die. Obviously, I didn't.

There are plenty of OB/GYN's around Detroit and Metro/Detroit and I would NEVER return to this Dr. She has a horrible attitude - very arrogant and certainly is impressed with herself instead of being concerned about her patients and their well being.
great doc, the best in Detroit, she delivered twins this year , she was absolutely wonderful

I told Dr. Monica Lee there was something wrong and asked if she could do a culture she said I was fine, its nothing serious, in a couple of days my issue got worse I went to urgent care and they did a culture and found the issue. I will not be going back to her
When ever I asked questions it seem like she have problems asking them or give an attitude, but she does give pretty good answers
Dr. Lee was great. She was willing to work with me on my delivery thanks to her I successful had my second baby VBAC and she tried twice to turn the baby. She is AMAZING and so is her nurse
He takes his time and listens. The physician has great bed side manner.
Bedside manner needs work but who cares when he knows what he's doing.Tho he treats the problem not the person,I liked him because he got to the point, and didn't BS me.
BY FAR THE WORST DOCTOR I HAVE EVER SEEN!!!! DID NOT CARE HOW A PERSON FEELS AT ALL

I read some reviews online and almost cancelled my appointment. I thank God every day that I didn't. Dr. Eisenstein spent almost an hour with me during my first appointment with him, answering all of my questions, and getting to know me as a patient. (After 7 years of ttc with specialists of all kinds, finding a doctor who listened to me, and what I was going through was refreshing and validating.) When my MRI showed that my condition was more serious than first believed, he called me personally and had another 45 minute conversation with me. When I thanked him, he told me that we were a team, and that I had to be 100% onboard before he took me into the operating room. He didn't take the easy way out with surgery options for me, and did everything he could to help me get my quality of life back, while maintaining my fertility. He was thorough with every explanation, and made sure to show me pictures with the explanations. He never rushed me during our appointments, never made me feel like I couldn't ask questions, and I asked A LOT. He was wonderful with my family after surgery, making sure that they also understood everything that was going on and what he had done during the surgery. My recovery has been great and I look forward to having my quality of life back! You owe it to yourself to meet with him before agreeing to any gynecological surgery!

Very disappointed with my experience with Dr. Eisenstein. He is greatly knowledgeable at his profession but lacks all ability to communicate with his patients. Do not waste your time and I hope my review can save you from the heartache and disappointment that I had encountered.

Very disappointed after waiting SO long for what many other Dr's within HFHS calling him "the best". He doesn't have the time to look at ALL of the facts regarding an appropriate diagnosis, nor does he care to listen to or even minutely empathize with the legitimate, excruciating pain I've been experiencing for many, many months. He was quick to have my symptoms completely minimized and actual test results either overlooked or disregarded. This is someone who thinks much more highly of himself and his time than any patient's and it was a huge let down to experience. If I'd known, I wouldn't have waited months waiting to meet with him and would have gone elsewhere and hopefully met a Dr who truly had my best interest, and proper treatment/diagnosis in mind. If you have a condition that is more grey versus black and white, go elsewhere. It's not worth your time, or even worse - smashed hope - to get proper care. Also, if he DOESN'T figure out what's wrong with you, Phase 2 of his process (which occurs if he can't diagnose you) actually has you living undiagnosed or treated and just living in pain daily, but still under his apparent care. That in itself was so incredibly sad to hear. Obviously, ego is more precious than actually putting a patient's health first.

Before I went to see Dr. Eisenstein, I read these reviews and crossed my fingers that the negative ones were just flukes. When I met him, it did seem at first like this was the case: he was personable and attentive, (though I had a sneaking suspicion his non-diagnosis of my pelvic pain as "neurological" was just complete BS, a way to cover up his inability to find the source of my discomfort). Regardless, my follow-up experience with him has been horrendous. I have been trying for over two weeks to get an increased dosage on the medication I am already taking, which is what Dr. Eisenstein told me to do, and also get recommendations for a therapist to provide CBT, again in keeping with Dr. Eisenstein's own treatment plan. His secretary does not call me back, period. I got a nurse to contact the doctor about my medication, but after more days of waiting, Dr. Eisenstein said I would have to come back into the office to see him, just so he'd write me a script. I refuse to travel all the way to his office and pay for an appointment, (my insurance does not cover the treatment as I'm out-of-state) just so he can give the nurse permission to call my pharmacy. That's a real expensive phone call. Instead, I called my former doctor and, without even mentioning an appointment, she agreed to change my dosage, even though she hasn't seen me in months. Thanks for absolutely nothing, Dr. Eisenstein.

Love Dr. Eisenstein. Delivered 2 of my 4 children and has been great for all of the years I've been with him. we have a good rapport and he has never made me feel like he didn't have time to address any of my concerns. He is knowledgeable and good at what he does.

When I first met Dr. Eisenstein, he spent a good deal of time with me and I left feeling hopeful that I might finally find some relief from my pain. However, after that he did ABSOLUTELY NO follow through on anything he said. He didn't call in my prescriptions, didn't contact my physical therapist, and didn't submit the paperwork for my procedure that he said he would. He then tried to lie to me and said he had done all those things. I called him out on it as I was crying on the phone and he said "look I'm very busy". I tried to go forward with the procedure because of the time I had invested. He again was hard to get a hold of ( I waited on hold for 46 minutes), and didn't want to talk with me. Whenever I did get him on the phone, he couldn't even remember my info. My procedure (Botox) was cancelled due to the insurance companies stating it was an experimental procedure. That was two weeks ago and I've heard NOTHING from Dr. Eisenstein. He has NO concern for his patients.

I love DR.Eisenstein! I have been going to him for over ten years,two pregnancies one of which I had some problems. He is very knowledgeable and caring. Do not understand the comments about money, I have seen him with both private health insurance as well as state health insurance; I sill received the same great care and he is cute too!

Dr. Eisenstein does not relate to me nor did he listen to me. He was very cold and more focused on him being a doctor with a lot of knowledge than me being a patient a human being with feelings and emotions.
It is very obvious that he doesn't really care about the patient.
cares more about money than the patient
great doctor...i would send all my friends and family to him
Great doctor, knows a wealth of information for women wellness.
Dr. Sherman delivered my daughter 12 years ago. She is by-far the best doctor I've ever seen. At that time, she worked with St. John Hospital & Medical Center.

Dr. Schneider is very friendly and helpful. She saw me through my entire pregnancy, though not for the delivery. Visits were always relaxed and she was able to answer any questions I had. I had a unique circumstance with regards to the pregnancy and she made me and my partner feel comfortable talking about any concerns. I can't wait to see her again, this time with the hopes that she'll be available to deliver my baby.

He is truly the most kind hearted,caring,amazing doctor anyone could ever ask for!! I have had losses and he helped me have my first child! My son came early due to preeclampsia and hes in the nicu and dr mason comes and checks on him twice a week! He really puts my mind at ease and I am so glad hes my dr. I now look forward to getting pregnant in a couple years again because I know I will be In good hands with him as my dr! This rating is for Dr. Brian Mason who works in professional building one suite 320 in detroit mi he is a fantastic high risk obgyn
Best Doctor in the World!!!! He is a truly genuine doctor. So grateful to have had him deliver my child.

Unfortunately, I don't think the scale goes high enough for this doctor. He is more like a ten !!! Ladies, I am a nurse and I have owrked with too many doctors and frankly lost faith that there were no good doctors out there period. Until I became a patient of Dr. Mason. This man is fabulous not because he is a nice guy but because he is an extremely knowledgeable and skilled practitioner. I have never felt this way about any health care professional. I feel completely safe in his care.

Dr Mason saved my baby's life. He is always courteous, respectful, knowledgeable, competent and the best doctor I have ever seen! He took me on as a patient half way into my pregnancy when I went into preterm pabor. He saw me weekely and sometimes biweekly for a difficult pregnancy. He was always sympathetic regarding my pain and did whatever he could to ensure my comfort and my baby's safety. When my baby was born, Dr MAson checked on her whenever he was in the hospital in the NICU for her entire 33 day stay. He would ask how she and my husband and I were doing and would even ask the neonatal doctors questions to clarify things for us!!! I would recommend Dr Mason as a high quality doctor and human being!
A very knowledgeable and compassionate doctor. She helped us through a very rough time in our pregnancy and made us feel comfortable.
Very helpful. Caring and thoughtful. Sara worked very hard to accommodate my personal needs.
Dr. Kaveeshvar is an exemplary doctor who went the extra mile in my case! I am blessed and thankful for him. (mgh)
very helpful and knowledgeable. The staff was great and made me feel welcomed.

My mother and I have been going for years to him. I swear this man is a god...so expereienced and so smart. He no longer does ob , since he no longer practices ob. He did tell me I was gonna have issues, this man called it. He is a saint, too bad the idiots I went to didnt listen and when they did it was too late, I lost the baby. What I woud give for this dr. to pracctice ob, he only does Gyno issues...love him..he is an awesome dr, so understanding and so smart.

Doctor Zilo is the most kind, caring, smart, and has a big heart for the people who is under her care, doctor Zilo is so knowledgeable, thank you for being a real doctor who cares about me and took the time to find out what is wrong and save my life.
I should say a very caring and a dynamic doctor. if she is treating you. Then stay calm.you are in very good hands.

He is VERY thorough! He does warn you in the worst case scenario but does not mean to scare you. I had a great working relationship with him because he is also VERY proactive. I cannot say enough good things about him! The punctuality factor is not all on him because of what he has to deal with so I think that is a moot point but his staff does what they can to keep things moving. His bedside manner is great and he is a warm individual. It was May 21,2001 that I gave birth to twins and every time I look at my kids, I have him to thank for it. I did have complications in the latter stages but he never balked at any time. When he retires, the ob/gyn world will lose a wonderful talent.
Love her! She is wonderful delivered my baby! Did a fantastic job.
Excellent physician. He was very knowledgeable and did an excellent job on my surgery.
She makes me feel very comfortable and knows what she is doing. I have recommended her to all my family and friends.

Dr. Brent Gillum is one of the few doctors I know that actually listen then research the issue and will give you a clear understanding on what he find out, that will solve the problem. All the staff are friendly and make you feel comfortable.

Dr. Appiah is wonderful. He is always very patient and always answers all questions that I have. He looks into things that you are concerned about and he is knowledgeable. He delivered my daughter via emergency C-section and is now taking care of me with my current pregnancy. He offers VBACS and does not force testing or anything else on new mothers. He is a very good doctor!
She was fantastic, but hsa retired.
He's been my gyn for over 30 yrs. He's delivered my 3 kids. He's very nice, his nurse is extremely nice. I've recommended him to many people including my own girls. Everybody loves him.

Dr. Solomon always takes time to answer all of my questions, I never feel rushed. She is highly knowledgeable. I turned to her when I felt no one in my own area could or would help me and she has done a wonderful job with my help.
Dr. Simmerman is very understanding and he listens to all of your questions
Dr. Kmak delivered my twins. He was excellent thoughout the entire pregnancy. I'd highly recommend him to anyone!
Very knowledgeable and experienced. A little rough during examinations at times and not very warm or personable, but he knows what he's doing.

Never has anytime to answer your questions. She is unprofessional and her main goal is to make money from you without providing necessary services. She is basically a bad human being and overall a CROOK!
You put your life in danger when you deal with this unprofessional quack
Staff is very friendly and helpful.... i had read doctor is rude etc..she was also very good...

I did not get my questions answered by this doctor. She insulted me and shouted at me when I asked the question again. She is very rude and ran out of the room without taking care of me. I will never see her again.
Dr. Sharma has been my doctor for about 18 years. She delivered 2 of my 4 children and has done a good job taking care of me. She is friendy and helpful.

She has blamed me for everything instead of looking into what really could be the problem. Sent me home crying because she yelled at me about how I don't care about my unborn child, and has through my birth plan was useless and asking too much, she only looked at the front cover, btw it wasn't I had another doctor look at it and they where surprised I wasn't asking more. I've waited there before for over a hour and I was the only one there. She is rude and not caring at all. I'm surprised I stuck with her til I was 37 weeks pregnant. Also gave me a hard time about not wanting to deliver at providence because of how rude they were to me when I was in there the 3 times I ending up in the labor and delivery and seemed more like she cared about having this birth on her record and not someone else.

She is the worst doctor you can ever come across. My whole pregnency has become a nightmare because of her.Please please dont go to her ever.She sent me 3 to emergency and the ppl out there were suprised to why was i there and every visit she use to sold me for no reason.I had a fouth degree tear and i wonder why she did not do episiotomy and just when i taught i am healing from the stitches she said she has to restitch me. HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE. The only solution she knows is bed rest she will scare you to max and put you on bed rest which will make you delivery even diff. If you want to enjoy your pregnency DONT GO TO HER PLEASE.............She will leave you DEPRESSED,UNHAPPY and CRAPPY.

This doctor is an alarmist, and tried to use fear to make me have a procedure done that she refused to explain the need for. Charges were made for over 100 dollars besides the office visit, just to put 2 lab tests in the mail, which chgs. were refused by my ins. company. She did not return my calls concerning questions I had about my care. I listened to her argue on the phone with the bldg. management, and she seemed to have no qualms about doing this in front of a patient. She has twice dismissed out of hand medical opinions that I have raised with her that I obtained from reliable sources. She was just plain wrong, and was unable to discuss or listen. I have found another doctor who is highly recommended and listens and converses in an itelligent and caring way. I am glad I did because it means I will not be having an unnecessary procedure done at the hospital.
Have been to Dr. Sharma for over 15 years. Trust her fully. Very knowledgeable and thorough in treatments and followup.
I have had a very bad experience with this doctor. She is angry and it shows when she deals with you. She has no respect for her patients and she is very incompetent.

Good bedside manor is about all you get with this group. I would choose a cranky jerk who knows what they are doing over good bedside manor any day. That's not even touching on the fact that their patients wait 2+ hours in the waiting room for every visit. They trip book every appointment. All procedures (inductions, deliveries, cesarean sections) are done around their dinner/sleep plans. If your labor is not at a convenient time then you get cut. Trust me on this.

Best doctor I've every had. He truely cares about you and listens to your needs. Having 2 high risk pregnacies he safed both my kids lifes. I can't say enough. I have and will continue to recommeded him!!!
Very caring and knowledgable doctor
Rude, rude, rude. She is the only one talking, patient has to be quiet.

Have been going to see Dr. Flom for three years. Always kind, compassionate and very knowledgeabel and able to answer all my questions. Staff has always been kind and considerate. Would highly recommend her.
Most unprofessional office staff I have ever encountered. Dr. Flom is okay but you will regret coming there because of the way her staff treats you. Dr. Flom is knowledgeable but cold.
Worst doctor ever!! Terrible bedside manner. Doesnt know anything!! Terrible experience!Dont be a patient of hers. Not only she is she horrible but I actually caught her staff stealing from me!!
extremely compassionate during a very difficult time
Dr. Thigpen was my doctor and St. John and I loved him. Very empathetic with great bedside manners. Also very knowledgable and gave me different options.

very unprofessional..... This doctor didn't have any compassion, empathy towards a woman in labor. He frowned upon her circumstances related to the pregnancy. Sighed and huffed as if in disgust. As a doctor one should refrain from facial or verbal expressions when a patient isn't who they think they should be. Go back to med school and learn customer service..
Very Very RUDE

I wish I would have found this site months ago. To say I am unhappy with the "care" I'm receiving from Dr. Wright would be an understatement. This lady should not work with pregnant woman, definitely not women who are high risk. She is everything already mentioned- cold and inconsiderate.

My husband and I were shocked at this doctor's insulting manner and comments when she came into our ultrasound room. The staff and our tech had been curteous and helpful, but she was rude without any reason as soon as she entered. She, very sarcastically and while rolling her eyes, told me my husband and 1.5 year old son should leave the room, because my son's whining was "distracting" to her. And since we didn't comply, she spent a total of 15 seconds looking at my baby's ultrasound before telling me that it looked fine. Not a very thorough exam for a high-risk OB speciallist. I sincerely hope this child is fine for her sake, otherwise I will make a complaint if something was not detected that could have been. We have been going to St. John's Hospital for ages, and I have been extremely happy with our care, the staff, and the highly compassionate and able doctors. This was my first time with any complaint. This was also my first and last time ever seeing this Dr. Deborah Wright.

Absolutely horrible bedside manner. In my opinion she is the "Ice Queen of Obstetrics". Seems more concerned with cost than patient care. She is very condescending when speaking to patients. She is argumentative and appears to be almost spiteful in her recommendations to nurses and staff about patient orders. She treated us like complete idiots even though her colleagues had expressed differing opinions from hers. I wish I could convey just how bad I feel this doctor is... However, most of the St. John's staff is nothing like this. So, if you can avoid the Ice Queen you will be quite happy with you patient care at this hospital.

I had my first baby in early 2015 so, of course, I had a lot of questions. Dr. Aguin came off as condescending and aloof. I didn't want to switch to a different practice due to the location, but will be going elsewhere for future services

I feel that doctor sandelin has no compassion for his patients. Ive been a patient there for year and i just started to feel more abd more un satisfied with his care. He gives the bare minimum information that i need for my situation and i still was having problems and he literally told me there was nothing else he could do for me. Thats insane! I couldnt believe him....but no i would never recommend his clinic and i will never use his clinic again.

Dr. has a very bad bedside manner. She talks down on people and talks to you as if you are an idiot. She is not compassionate and was not concerned for my emotional needs considering I was a nervous wreck and was having soooo many pregnancy complications. She was very cold. WOuld never see her again.

Doctor Baumann was very abrasive, came into the room and sat with me for 3 minutes before telling me the pain that I was in was insignificant and to pretty much get over it. He the proceeded to refuse to examine me or order the test results from the ER which prompted this visit. He became abusive and once I was in the hallway he attempted to humiliate me in front of other patients and his nurses. I lodged a complaint with his office manager and intend to file a complaint with the AMA and my insurance company regarding this "Doctor". I urge you to not use this Doctor!
Dr. Parisi is a wonderful doctor. She always takes up plenty of time and always finds the answers to your problems. Highly recommend.

I would recommend Dr. Pickens to any woman who is need of a caring, funny, and thoughtful OB. He takes the time to answer any questions you may have and is very knowledgable about the things you ask of him. I have been going to Dr. Pickens for over 15 years and would hate for the day to come when he decides to retire because nobody takes care of you like Dr. Alex Pickens.

Dr. pickens was usually very punctual. He always took the time to explain each procedure before it was performed. Dr. pickens was always very well informed and made sure that I was kept abreast of each and every procedure. I would recommend him highly. It is not often that you find a doctor who seems to be genuinely concerned about his or her patient.After every exam he would take you to his office and explain to you his finding and what he suggests the manner of dealing with it. Dr. pickens had a way of making you feel at ease and his staff was also very helpful in this process also.

His incompetence, his non sense, costed me a fortune. Stay away from this doctor, he is clueless, careless, in desperate need of a standard first aid course. How desperate is the healthcare system to hire a sorry excuse of a doctor like this guy . if you are stuck with him get a midwife, they are way, way more competent than he is. I'll go as far as saying a janitor is to be trusted more than Babik. STAY AWAY FROM HIM!!!! BETTER YET TAKE AWAY HIS LICENSE TO PRACTICE!!!!

Had him for OBGYN when I was expecting my first child. He never told me anything that was going on with my pregnacy and was not the friendliest. Wish i could've had a better experience for my first...
Has no compassion. Would not recommend, had a terrible experience in the hospital with her.
Overall horrible experience, refused to listen and is very condescending.

This has been my worst experience with a doctor's office to date. I have attempted twice to see Dr. Reaves to obtain birth control. On the first attempt, I waited over an hour and still had not been seen. I had to leave. Now, I have made a second attempt and not only did I wait an hour without being seen but her medical assistant is VERY rude. I called about a week previous to the appointment so say that I wanted an IUD. I was told my appointment would be a week out so that they can order the IUD. When I get to the office the rude medical assistant first tries to charge me $40 my only $20 copay but also states that they still have yet to order my IUD. Apparently the doctor had to see me first which would have been fine if I would have been notified. I had to leave work early to get absolutely nothing accomplished for the SECOND time. Having to deal with the eye rolling and attitude of her medical assistant did not help either. I will never attempt to see Dr. Reaves again.

My visit with Dr. Mayra Troya-Nutt was horrible, I had to wait almost an hour to see her and when I finally got to speak with her she was very unfriendly and she doesn't listen to the patient which all doctors should believe and listen to what the patient tells them. I would not recommend anyone to her. Not all but some of the staff that work at Detroit Community Health Connection are unprofessional.
